channel.title: Microsoft 365 platform call on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

image.title: Microsoft 365 platform call on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 platform call on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 27th of September, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Build a productivity dashboard by using Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio, and Latest status and the next investments areas for SharePoint Framework. Registration open for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp training. Delivered 6 articles, 2 podcasts.

Two demos - Build a productivity dashboard by using Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio, and Latest status and the next investments areas for SharePoint Framework. Registration open for Microsoft Ignite and Microsoft Teams App Camp training. Delivered 6 articles, 2 podcasts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 20th of September, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Introduction to SharePoint Online Admin APIs on Microsoft Graph and Getting started with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Registration is now open for Microsoft Ignite – October 12-14, 2022. Delivered 4 articles and PnP Weekly this week.

Two demos - Introduction to SharePoint Online Admin APIs on Microsoft Graph and Getting started with Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Registration is now open for Microsoft Ignite – October 12-14, 2022. Delivered 4 articles and PnP Weekly this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 13th of September, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Microsoft Graph Postman - Scripts and advanced functionality, Introduction to Microsoft Teams Toolkit, and Introduction to app camp training package for Microsoft Teams ISVs. Delivered 5 articles, 2 Microsoft Teams samples and PnP Weekly this week.

Three demos - Microsoft Graph Postman - Scripts and advanced functionality, Introduction to Microsoft Teams Toolkit, and Introduction to app camp training package for Microsoft Teams ISVs. Delivered 5 articles, 2 Microsoft Teams samples and PnP Weekly this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 6th of September, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Latest on eDiscovery Premium APIs on Microsoft Graph. New features in SharePoint Framework 1.16 preview, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph X-Ray project. Delivered 10 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week. Announced Microsoft Teams App Camp.

Three demos - Latest on eDiscovery Premium APIs on Microsoft Graph. New features in SharePoint Framework 1.16 preview, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph X-Ray project. Delivered 10 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week. Announced Microsoft Teams App Camp.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Community call schedules - July-August 2022
item.description: Weekly Microsoft 365 platform community call is on a break during July-August 2022.
Weekly Microsoft 365 platform community call is on a break during July-August 2022.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 28th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Taking advantage of the Microsoft Graph Postman collections, Introduction on the Microsoft Viva Learning extensibility, and Introduction to Virtual Appointment Microsoft Graph API. Delivered 6 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week.

Three demos - Taking advantage of the Microsoft Graph Postman collections, Introduction on the Microsoft Viva Learning extensibility, and Introduction to Virtual Appointment Microsoft Graph API. Delivered 6 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 21st of June, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Using the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK for common operations and Get started with UI Library for Azure Communication Services. Delivered 8 new articles/documents this week. Introduced Microsoft Community Initiative to build a unified Microsoft Cloud Community.

Two demos - Using the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK for common operations and Get started with UI Library for Azure Communication Services. Delivered 8 new articles/documents this week. Introduced Microsoft Community Initiative to build a unified Microsoft Cloud Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 14th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Latest on deprecating basic auth for Exchange, Introduction to Microsoft Graph .Net SDK v5, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph Postman collection. Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update and 8 new documents/articles released.

Three demos - Latest on deprecating basic auth for Exchange, Introduction to Microsoft Graph .Net SDK v5, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph Postman collection. Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update and 8 new documents/articles released.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 7th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Migrate your SharePoint workflows to Power Automate with migration tooling (preview), TeamsJS SDK V2 to extend your Microsoft Teams solutions to Outlook and Office, and Send a SMS message with Azure Communication Services. New articles, updated samples.

Three demos - Migrate your SharePoint workflows to Power Automate with migration tooling (preview), TeamsJS SDK V2 to extend your Microsoft Teams solutions to Outlook and Office, and Send a SMS message with Azure Communication Services. New articles, updated samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 31st of May, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Latest on the Microsoft Graph developer portal updates and Microsoft Build 2022 - key announcements for Microsoft 365 platform. Highlighted 19 Microsoft 365 Platform related articles supporting announcements at Build.

Two demos - Latest on the Microsoft Graph developer portal updates and Microsoft Build 2022 - key announcements for Microsoft 365 platform. Highlighted 19 Microsoft 365 Platform related articles supporting announcements at Build.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 24th of May, 2022
item.description: The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.

The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 17th of May, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Integrate Microsoft Graph connector content on Office.com, and Your Microsoft 365 app within the fingertips of employees with Viva Connections. Announced new training - Writing for the Web, 5 articles, and 1 Teams bot sample.

Two demos - Integrate Microsoft Graph connector content on Office.com, and Your Microsoft 365 app within the fingertips of employees with Viva Connections. Announced new training - Writing for the Web, 5 articles, and 1 Teams bot sample.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 10th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos this week - Extend your Teams Search Based Message Extension to Outlook and Getting started on using Azure Communication Services in your web site. Released Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – May 2022 update + articles, documents, videos, podcasts and more.

Demos this week - Extend your Teams Search Based Message Extension to Outlook and Getting started on using Azure Communication Services in your web site. Released Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – May 2022 update + articles, documents, videos, podcasts and more.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 3rd of May, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Extend your Microsoft Teams app to Outlook and Office, Introducing new M365 Assessment Tool with SharePoint Syntex Module, and Run Office Scripts with a button- now in Excel for Windows. Review latest articles, documents, and podcasts.

Three demos - Extend your Microsoft Teams app to Outlook and Office, Introducing new M365 Assessment Tool with SharePoint Syntex Module, and Run Office Scripts with a button- now in Excel for Windows. Review latest articles, documents, and podcasts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 26th of April, 2022
item.description: Two great demos: Create an app that extends across Teams, Outlook, and Office, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples.
Two great demos: Create an app that extends across Teams, Outlook, and Office, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 19th of April, 2022
item.description: Three great demos: Latest on Microsoft Graph Data Connect datasets, Extending Teams apps to Outlook and Office.com, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples. The Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – April 2022 update is now available!

Three great demos: Latest on Microsoft Graph Data Connect datasets, Extending Teams apps to Outlook and Office.com, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples. The Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – April 2022 update is now available!
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 12th of April, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Building in meeting document signing app for Microsoft Teams and Building wellbeing solution with Teams and Viva Connections. Released Microsoft 365 Unified Sample Solution Gallery with 1040 samples, 3 new articles and 3 Teams documents.

Two demos - Building in meeting document signing app for Microsoft Teams and Building wellbeing solution with Teams and Viva Connections. Released Microsoft 365 Unified Sample Solution Gallery with 1040 samples, 3 new articles and 3 Teams documents.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
